meanings.definition: Resembling putty in texture or consistency.
meanings.sent1: The dough was puttylike, easy to mold and shape.
meanings.sent2: The clay was puttylike, perfect for sculpting.
meanings.sent3: The puttylike substance stuck to his hands, making them look funny.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was puttylike, easily changing from joy to sadness.
meanings.sent5: The puttylike material oozed out of the container, ready to be used.

meanings.definition: Having the qualities or characteristics of putty.
meanings.sent1: The toy had a puttylike feel, squishy and flexible.
meanings.sent2: The fabric was puttylike, stretching easily without tearing.
meanings.sent3: His puttylike behavior in class made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The city streets were puttylike, constantly changing and adapting.
meanings.sent5: The puttylike consistency of the cake made it melt in your mouth.
